name: iscpf
description: Validate CPF Numbers (for NodeJS and browsers)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run uglify
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish && git push origin master --tags
scripts.build:patch: npm version patch && npm run deploy
scripts.build:minor: npm version minor && npm run deploy
scripts.build:major: npm version major && npm run deploy
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run lint

author: Fernando Daciuk - @fdaciuk
